trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents a package of compressed files in the zip archive format.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx x xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The stream that contains the archive to be read.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The stream is already closed or does not support reading.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: stream is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The contents of the stream are not in the zip archive format.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The input or output stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

One of the enumeration values that indicates whether the zip archive is used to read, create, or update entries.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxx xx xxxx$ xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The stream is already closed, or the capabilities of the stream do not match the mode.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: stream is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: mode is an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxx$$xx$ xx xx xxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The input or output stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

One of the enumeration values that indicates whether the zip archive is used to read, create, or update entries.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxx xx xxxx$ xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The stream is already closed, or the capabilities of the stream do not match the mode.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: stream is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: mode is an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxx$$xx$ xx xx xxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The input or output stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

One of the enumeration values that indicates whether the zip archive is used to read, create, or update entries.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxx xx xxxx$ xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The encoding to use when reading or writing entry names in this archive.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Specify a value for this parameter only when an encoding is required for interoperability with zip archive tools and libraries that do not support UTF-8 encoding for entry names.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxxxxx x xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx XXX$0 xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The stream is already closed, or the capabilities of the stream do not match the mode.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: stream is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: mode is an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxx$$xx$ xx xx xxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the collection of entries that are currently in the zip archive.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The collection of entries that are currently in the zip archive.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zip archive does not support reading.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zip archive has been disposed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zip archive is corrupt, and its entries cannot be retrieved.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx$ xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value that describes the type of action the zip archive can perform on entries.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

One of the enumeration values that describes the type of action (read, create, or update) the zip archive can perform on entries.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx $xxxx$ xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxx$ xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Creates an empty entry that has the specified path and entry name in the zip archive.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A path, relative to the root of the archive, that specifies the name of the entry to be created.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx$ xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx$ xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An empty entry in the zip archive.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: entryName is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxXxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zip archive does not support writing.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zip archive has been disposed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Creates an empty entry that has the specified entry name and compression level in the zip archive.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A path, relative to the root of the archive, that specifies the name of the entry to be created.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx$ xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx$ xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to emphasize speed or compression effectiveness when creating the entry.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An empty entry in the zip archive.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: entryName is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxXxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zip archive does not support writing.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zip archive has been disposed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true to finish writing the archive and release unmanaged and managed resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Retrieves a wrapper for the specified entry in the zip archive.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx x xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A path, relative to the root of the archive, that identifies the entry to retrieve.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx$ xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx$ xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A wrapper for the specified entry in the archive; null if the entry does not exist in the archive.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: entryName is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxXxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zip archive does not support reading.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zip archive has been disposed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zip archive is corrupt, and its entries cannot be retrieved.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx$ xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
